entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
